0.ahk: Koˬroˬ naˬ vaiˇ rasˆ gaˇ kawˆ

4.wbm: Caw ti tawng viag Corona an mawh viag yuh ka mawx?

9.wbm: Chix tiang haok ka maix khaing ceu in.

12.wbm: Jhawm saux chix pre yam jah rawm in.

13.wbm: Ot 6 sawk, chix tieb tie ka viag pa yie tiang hu.

17.wbm: Mah kheu nan, phan yaox pui mauk, miah mai saux caw ti hawt been awm pa koe plak greem awx.

18.wbm:
Tawx pa tawb meeh (mask) ka kix. Kheu miah, mauk nawh kadaux man tawb meeh, chix tieb tie ka pui pa
koe rob rem tix heue.

22.wbm:
Viang nawh ang saux kawx
nawh chix tieb tie tokaux tix.

23.wbm:
Saux viag koe mie ding kaux ang chix goih tawng mawh kheu nan
chix tiang hu khaing heue.

24.wbm:
Kheu ex ang chix tawng pui mawx pa koe jhawm
saux viag, caw tix via khaing dee ot pui hun heue.

38.wbm: Khaix an mia pui saux kawx chix koe ka kraung shiao. Lox tiag

39.wbm: Chix tiang saux ka maix mai kix uik heue.

40.wbm: Giex ka ngai baoh pui pa moh

42.wbm: Phan maix krox ngai baoh tix khaing giex ceu an

43.wbm: Phan sang tieb tie caw ti khoek taix tix singax mhawm ka sidah khoek mai rawm sidah plai.

44.wbm:
Viag an pon ot im ka piang kraung
shiao tom rheung heue.

47.wbm: Ceu pa caw ti yuh son krax tieb tie

48.wbm: -      Phan hawt yuh awm an mawh pa nie mhawm heue.

52.wbm:
Paw teeh ka ngai baoh tix (a) ngai baoh pui tang
kaux. Phan lo ti krox caw ti khoek taix tix ka sidah
khoek mhawm mhawm heue.

53.wbm: Kieh rheeng bawgyam awm ah lox lai iak ra bawg awx

59.wbm: Phan piawm krox paw khi rhawm caw ti khoek taix tix ka sidah khoek mhawm mhawm heue.

60.wbm: Paw krox ka plak praix man tawb meeh.

62.wbm: Phan rheung jheep man tawb meeh tix mu viag chix ot ti ting daux man an heue.

63.wbm: Man tawb meeh shiao tix bawg paw shiao lheu khaing tix ngaix phan maox bhaw caw ti tik heue.

68.wbm: Kieh tang shiao man ot cao tix.

69.wbm: Paw riem shiao ka kraung, kawk rawm, man awt mai priex ih tau.

70.wbm: Maix ang chix yuh jhong taix maix hu krox ka ngaix baoh maix ceeix kawx heue.

71.wbm: Phan sang paoh siviex paoh ka jhong taix (a) nyheen paoh ka klip tix. Paw paoh ka taix tix.

75.wbm: Khoek taix ka sidah khoek sijheeng

Ot mhawm khaing
krax lhat graung

bookText.wbm:
Grawh grawng viag Corona



 Caw ti tawng viag Corona an mawh viag yuh ka mawx?


Grawng pre viag.
Jheeh

Meeh

Ngai

Chix tiang haok ka maix khaing ceu in.

Pui pa
nyawm ot
Pui koe
jhawm saux

Jhawm saux chix pre yam jah rawm in.

Ot 6 sawk, chix tieb tie ka viag pa yie tiang hu.
1
 6 sawk

   Haik cho

Mah kheu nan, phan yaox pui mauk, miah mai saux caw ti hawt been awm pa koe plak greem awx.

Tawx pa tawb meeh (mask) ka kix. Kheu miah, mauk nawh kadaux man tawb meeh, chix tieb tie ka pui pa
koe rob rem tix heue.
2
Ting buan son
(pui miah)

Phan ang mawh nan

Viang nawh ang saux kawx
nawh chix tieb tie tokaux tix.
 Saux viag koe mie ding kaux ang chix goih tawng mawh kheu nan
chix tiang hu khaing heue.

 Kheu ex ang chix tawng pui mawx pa koe jhawm
saux viag, caw tix via khaing dee ot pui hun heue.
Thu shiao
 Pui nyawm ot

maox giex taix
daux cheu
pa yeen daux bawng cag
plah ce
kawk rawm


kraung cag pa shiao

 Plak praix man tawb meeh

Taix haok bawng

Maok


Gawng tiiem

Pang siviex

Taix nawh

Khaix an mia pui saux kawx chix koe ka kraung shiao. Lox tiag

Chix tiang saux ka maix mai kix uik heue.
Giex ka ngai baoh pui pa moh

Giex ngai tix

Phan maix krox ngai baoh tix khaing giex ceu an

Phan sang tieb tie caw ti khoek taix tix singax mhawm ka sidah khoek mai rawm sidah plai.
Viag an pon ot im ka piang kraung
shiao tom rheung heue.

 Sidah khoek


Ceu pa caw ti yuh son krax tieb tie
-      Phan hawt yuh awm an mawh pa nie mhawm heue.

Khoek tom hoek dee in

Sidah khoek

Jhong taix
Paw teeh ka ngai baoh tix (a) ngai baoh pui tang
kaux. Phan lo ti krox caw ti khoek taix tix ka sidah
khoek mhawm mhawm heue.

Kieh rheeng bawgyam awm ah lox lai iak ra bawg awx
Kadaux nghim taix

Rheeng 20 siekan

Sinax giien taix

Khoek plah taix

 Kudah ah mawh pa tix?

Phan piawm krox paw khi rhawm caw ti khoek taix tix ka sidah khoek mhawm mhawm heue.

Paw krox ka plak praix man tawb meeh.

Rawm jah ba koe viag.
Phan rheung jheep man tawb meeh tix mu viag chix ot ti ting daux man an heue.

Man tawb meeh shiao tix bawg paw shiao lheu khaing tix ngaix phan maox bhaw caw ti tik heue.

Shiao lawk tuh puk taux
-  Kawn

Keeing

Miex

Kieh tang shiao man ot cao tix.

Paw riem shiao ka kraung, kawk rawm, man awt mai priex ih tau.

Maix ang chix yuh jhong taix maix hu krox ka ngaix baoh maix ceeix kawx heue.
Phan sang paoh siviex paoh ka jhong taix (a) nyheen paoh ka klip tix. Paw paoh ka taix tix.

Ka nyiex

Yam hoek khaing
plak praix
Sivoe ang nyang
ih priex

 Khoek taix ka sidah khoek sijheeng

Dee sidah

Sidah khoek
Ot mhawm khaing
krax lhat graung

Ot mhawm khaing krax
Sidah khoek
